title: FaceMocap Plugin
description: Plugin to connect UE4 with Facewaretech Studio or Live Server.
longDescription:
FaceMocap plugin connects Unreal Engine with Faceware Live Server or Faceware Studio.


Video using Faceware Live Server: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lc8B4cjnsyU&

Video using Faceware Studio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7lSFC0Arq0&


Video showcase using metahumans, Argentinian news reporter:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQcVip3M0Os


Tutorial to easy setup metahumans with this plugin:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EjUtnhfwvIE


***before buying make sure to check faceware livelink feature, this plugin was an early alternative


UPDATES

*july 2021 (metahumans)

  • plugin now supports arkit schema (BlendShape names using the arkit names)
  • added curve asset to control arkit values (its useful to smooth or exaggerate BlendShape values)
  • metahumans use arkit schema, by making a few modifications to the "metahuman animation blueprint" its now possible to use this plugin to animate those characters(download the metahuman example project with the animation blueprint code from the links below)


Features:

  • Receives live BlendShape values from "Faceware Studio" or "Faceware Live Server"
  • Supports faceware "arkit schema" and "legacy schema"
  • Works at runtime (editor) and in packaged games (windows platform)
  • Its possible to record facial animations using the ue4 editor take recorder 
  • Mocap value modifiers (multiplier, offset, limits, curve) per BlendShape value using blueprint code
  • Network connection to Faceware allows you to choose IP address/port on a local or remote machine running the Faceware software


Blendshape modifiers:

-Multiplier (to exaggerate movement)

-Offset (to make movement start at certain value)

-Limits Max/Min (to avoid unnatural moves)

-Curve asset (curve to control values) only for arkit blendshapes


Join the discord channel https://discord.gg/kSfqw3tU


Try it yourself (executable for windows pc using the kid face):

https://motion.mx/ue4/FaceMocapResources/FaceMocapDemoForLiveServer.zip

(this demo requires Faceware running in the same pc, you can download a trial from faceware site)


The example provided is a good template to start with,

follow it to setup your own character with the FaceMocap plugin and Faceware.
technicalDetails:
The example provided is a good template to start with,

follow it to setup your own metahuman character to wok with FaceMocap plugin and Faceware.


Manual

https://motion.mx/ue4/FaceMocapResources/FaceMocapPluginManual.pdf

Example project

https://motion.mx/ue4/FaceMocapResources/FaceMocapExample.zip

Metahuman example project

https://motion.mx/ue4/FaceMocapResources/metahumanExampleProject.zip


Code Modules:

  •  FaceMocap [Runtime]

Number of Blueprints: 4

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Important/Additional Notes:

  • Faceware Live Server 2.5 or Faceware Studio 1.0 is required to use this plugin
  • Receives "named values" it will not consume "UV" values (for example jaw_open is available but raw face landmarks are not)
  • This plugin is not related to Facewaretech company, brand or has any commercial relation with them.
  • Updates are released only for the latest official versions of Unreal Engine, past versions will not be updated
  • Assets shown in the video "argentinian news reporter" are not included with this plugin

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
-added support for Facewaretech studio
-changed data parsing to use ue4 json classes
-no more messages of not found json values
-removed warnings
arkit schema update, now its posible to use faceware studio with arkit schema to stream blendshape values to ue4
